text: Ian Rush (born 20 October 1961) is a former Welsh international football player, who notably played for Liverpool and Juventus. He was a very successful striker, who set many goal-scoring records for Liverpool in particular. When he retired from playing, he returned to his first club and managed Chester City before going on to work on television. ==Career statistics== Club Season League National cup League Cup Europe
